name: team field with matchup_opponent_type param
description: Test case for team field with matchup_opponent_type param
expected_query: with "current_week_opponents" as (select "h" as "nfl_team", "v" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "week" = ${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_week} and "seas_type" = '${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_type}' union select "v" as "nfl_team", "h" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "week" = ${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_week} and "seas_type" = '${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_type}'), "t8eab6ab582cefa683d25edd23d775e72" as (select "nfl_plays"."off" as "team", count(distinct "nfl_plays"."esbid") as "rate_type_total_count" from "nfl_plays" where "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2024) group by "nfl_plays"."off"), "t21688413952ededbdad717469034208c" as (select "year", "week", v as nfl_team, h as game_opponent, true as game_is_home from "nfl_games" where "year" in (${constants.current_season.year}) and "week" in (${constants.current_season.week}) and "seas_type" = '${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_type}' and h IN ('WAS', 'ARI', 'LAR') union select "year", "week", h as nfl_team, v as game_opponent, false as game_is_home from "nfl_games" where "year" in (${constants.current_season.year}) and "week" in (${constants.current_season.week}) and "seas_type" = '${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_type}' and v IN ('WAS', 'ARI', 'LAR')), "t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0" as (select "nfl_plays"."def" as "nfl_team", SUM(pass_yds) AS team_pass_yds_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2024) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."def"), "t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0_team_stats" as (select "t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0"."nfl_team", sum(t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0.team_pass_yds_from_plays) as team_pass_yds_from_plays from "t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0" group by "t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0"."nfl_team") select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "player"."pos" AS "pos_0", CAST(t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0_team_stats.team_pass_yds_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(t8eab6ab582cefa683d25edd23d775e72.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS "team_pass_yds_from_plays_0", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "current_week_opponents" on "player"."current_nfl_team" = "current_week_opponents"."nfl_team" left join "t8eab6ab582cefa683d25edd23d775e72" on "t8eab6ab582cefa683d25edd23d775e72"."team" = "current_week_opponents"."opponent" inner join "t21688413952ededbdad717469034208c" on "t21688413952ededbdad717469034208c"."nfl_team" = "player"."current_nfl_team" left join "t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0_team_stats" on "t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0_team_stats"."nfl_team" = "current_week_opponents"."opponent" group by player.fname, player.lname, "player"."pos", "t2499920d348f58d2e046bda75243c5e0_team_stats"."team_pass_yds_from_plays", t8eab6ab582cefa683d25edd23d775e72.rate_type_total_count, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 5 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
